alert.note: Alert for Smith; Upshur; Wood (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 12:58PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Smith, southeastern Wood and western Upshur Counties through 130 PM CDT... At 1258 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hawkins, or 14 miles east of Mineola, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gladewater, Gilmer, Big Sandy, Hawkins, Rosewood, West Mountain, Union Grove, Red Springs, Bettie and Pritchett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for northeastern Texas.
